means: 符合，达到（要求、规定、标准等）

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"满足"之意。
means: satisfy ： 指完全达到预定的条件、要求、标准或期望、心愿等。
meet ： 指最低限度地达到预期的标准，或强调要达到这个标准的困难。
fulfil与satisfy基本同义，但侧重指实现的情况好于一般标准。

sentence.Network_en: Cheap goods are available, but not in sufficient quantities to satisfy demand.
sentence.Network_cn: 有一些廉价的商品，但是数量不足以满足需求。

sentence.Network_en: They are there only to satisfy their ghoulish curiosity.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们去那里纯粹是为了满足其病态的好奇心。

sentence.Network_en: The scandal stories satisfy people's curiosity for a few hours.
sentence.Network_cn: 有关丑闻的报道使人们的好奇心在几个小时内得到满足。

jx.jx_en_mean: (Brit.)reach the standard required to pass an examination

means.word_mean: 使满意,满足;符合;使高兴

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French satisfier, formed irregularly from Latin satisfacere 'to content', from satis 'enough' + facere 'make'

entry.def: If someone or something satisfies you, they give you enough of what you want or need to make you pleased or contented.

example.ex: The pace of change has not been quick enough to satisfy everyone...
example.tran: 变化的速度还不够快，不能让所有人都满意。

example.ex: We just can't find enough good second-hand cars to satisfy demand...
example.tran: 我们实在找不到足够多的性能良好的二手车，满足不了需求。

entry.tran: 使确信;使弄清楚;使信服
entry.def: To satisfy someone that something is true or has been done properly means to convince them by giving them more information or by showing them what has been done.

example.ex: He has to satisfy the environmental lobby that real progress will be made to cut emissions...
example.tran: 他必须令环境游说团体相信在减排方面将取得实质性进展。

example.ex: He wanted to satisfy himself that he had given his best performance.
example.tran: 他想说服自己他已经发挥到极致了。

entry.def: If you satisfy the requirements for something, you are good enough or have the right qualities to fulfil these requirements.

example.ex: The procedures should satisfy certain basic requirements.
example.tran: 这些程序应该符合某些基本要求。

means.word_mean: 1. fulfil the requirements or expectations of
3. fill or meet a want or need

auth_sentence.content: You can find a job that will satisfy you.
auth_sentence.res_content: You can find a job that will satisfy you.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You can find a job that will satisfy you.

auth_sentence.content: But statistics have not done much to satisfy lawmakers.
auth_sentence.res_content: But statistics have not done much to satisfy lawmakers.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But statistics have not done much to satisfy lawmakers.

auth_sentence.content: These should satisfy some of your concerns about re-analysis.
auth_sentence.res_content: These should satisfy some of your concerns about re-analysis.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: These should satisfy some of your concerns about re-analysis.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 令人满意的,圆满的,良好的,符合要求的
令人不满意的, 不能解决问题的, 不得人心的
stems_affixes.word_buile: un不+satisfactory令人满意的→adj.令人不满意的, 不能解决问题的, 不得人心的
satisfactory[adj.令人满意的,圆满的,良好的,符合要求的]+ly表副词→satisfactorily满意地

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不满,不平,令人不满的事物
stems_affixes.word_buile: dissatisfy[v.使感觉不满, 不满足]+action表名词→dissatisfaction不满,不平
satisfy[v.满意,使满意,使相信,说服]+action表名词→satisfy的名词→satisfaction满足,满意

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使感觉不满, 不满足
stems_affixes.word_buile: dis否定,不+satisfy[v.满意,使满意,使相信,说服]→v.使感觉不满, 不满足

stems_affixes.value_cn: 满意,使满意,使相信,说服

Sentence.sentence: According to Facebook's vice-president Elliot Schrage, the company is simply making changes to improve its service, and if people don't share information They have a "less satisfying experience".
Barbara, on the other hand, has missed the excitement of her profession and does not feel she would be satisfied doing volunteer work.
To satisfy the needs of their family.
You might expect that the student who had undertaken the most exhausted search would be the most satisfied with their final decision, but it turns out that's not true.
The reason why these people feel less satisfied is that a world of possibilities may also be a world of missed opportunities

sentences.cn: 没有任何东西能永远使人满足。

sentences.en: Her father tried his best to satisfy her demands.
sentences.cn: 她的父亲想尽一切办法来满足她的要求。

sentences.en: I satisfied them that there was no danger.
sentences.cn: 我使他们相信没有危险。

sentences.en: She satisfied herself that all doors were locked.

means.word_mean: 符合, 达到(要求、规定、标准等)

sentences.en: You can't vote until you have satisfied all the formal conditions.
sentences.cn: 你要符合所有的正式条件后才能参加选举。

jushi.chinese: 没有任何东西能永远使人满足。
财富并不能总是使人满足。
就我个人来说,我满意极了。
